definition: variant of 歸根結底|归根结底[gui1 gen1 jie2 di3]

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]

sentences.english: What it boils down to is a more skillful way of dealing with people.
sentences.chinese: 归根结柢，是一个更巧妙的方法来处理人。

sentences.english: After all, working together is what this business is all about.
sentences.chinese: 归根结柢，协力同心，是安利事业的经营之道。

definition: Classic of Rites (same as 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4])

three principles and five virtues (idiom)/the three rules (ruler guides subject, father guides son and husband guides wife) and five constant virtues of Confucianism (benevolence 仁, righteousness 義|义, propriety 禮|礼, wisdom 智 and fidelity 信)
one is judged by the company one keeps (idiom)
not beyond the scope of/nothing more than
to convert to (a religion)/to rely upon/refuge/mainstay
to add fuel to the flames
